title: Result when wages rise faster than productivity

content.question: In the short run, which of the following will most likely result if wages in an economy rise faster than workers’ productivity?

choices.label: An increase in the price level
An increase in efficiency in labor-intensive industries
A larger increase in property income than in labor income

content.answer: An increase in the price level

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
